ProductInfo.Features:
Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor included in this value package.
2 x1/3" Sharp CCD Security Camera, 600TV Line, 3.6mm lens, 24 Pcs LED, 65.6 Feet IR Distance.
4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR, HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording, HI 3520D CPU.
iPhone Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control. Indoor/Outdoor with weather proof compatibility
1 Year Warranty. Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW CCTV Surveillance Security Camera system package. FREE LED Monitor, 4 Channel H.264 960H DVR D1 Realtime recording 500GB HDD, 2 Sharp CCD Cameras 600TV Line, iPhone Android Viewable
